trans-unit.source: Represents a text effect that can be applied to text objects.

The TextEffect object allows you to add effects, such as animations, to text objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> class by specifying class property values.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref> that is applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> to apply to the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>.
The clipping region of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>.
The starting position in the text that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> applies to.
The number of positions in the text that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> applies to.
Gets or sets the clipping region of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that defines the clipping region.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect.Clip*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> to apply to the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush used to apply to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect.Foreground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the position in the text that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> applies to.
Setting the PositionCount value to a number that is greater than the maximum position in the affected text is valid.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref:System.Int32> value representing the position in the text that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> applies to.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect.PositionCount*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the starting position in the text that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> applies to.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref:System.Int32> value representing the starting position in the text that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> applies to.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect.PositionStart*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref> that is applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref> value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect.Transform*> dependency property.
To be added.
